meanings.sent1: The ammocetes swam gracefully in the river.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the ammocetes to learn more about lamprey life cycles.
meanings.sent3: The ammocetes threw a tiny party in the stream.
meanings.sent4: The ammocetes, like little underwater aliens, explored their watery world.
meanings.sent5: Children were amazed by the sight of the ammocetes transforming into adult lampreys.
